alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 5:40PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Umatilla, southeastern Walla Walla and south central Columbia Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 539 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Walla Walla, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walla Walla, Dixie and Kooskooskie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
